code: import React from"react";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{setFilter}from"../app/usersSlice";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const UserFilters=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const filters=useSelector(state=>state.users.filters);const handleFilterChange=(key,value)=>{dispatch(setFilter({key,value}));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:"flex",justifyContent:"space-between",paddingLeft:"30px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Filter by name",value:filters.name,onChange:e=>handleFilterChange("name",e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Filter by username",value:filters.username,onChange:e=>handleFilterChange("username",e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Filter by email",value:filters.email,onChange:e=>handleFilterChange("email",e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Filter by phone",value:filters.phone,onChange:e=>handleFilterChange("phone",e.target.value)})]});};
